mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, TEST_NO,TEST_COMMENT,TEST_REG_DATE, TEST_DATE,TEST_ORFILE,TEST_REFILE, TEST_CATE,TEST_TITLE,TEST_COR_CNT, TEST_PRO,TEST_ANSWER,TEST_RES_COD, TEST_RES_ANS,TEST_WRITER,TEST_MAKER, TEST_LEC_ID,TEST_TCATE_ID FROM (SELECT TEST_NO, TEST_COMMENT,TEST_REG_DATE,TEST_DATE, TEST_ORFILE,TEST_REFILE,TEST_CATE, TEST_TITLE,TEST_COR_CNT,TEST_PRO, TEST_ANSWER,TEST_RES_COD,TEST_RES_ANS, TEST_WRITER,TEST_MAKER,TEST_LEC_ID, TEST_TCATE_ID FROM TEST)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow} AND TEST_WRITER IS NULL AND TEST_MAKER = #{tutor_no} ORDER BY RNUM DESC
